GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v4.14.292
GSD.description:
md: call __md_stop_writes in md_stop

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.292 by commit 1678ca35b80a94d474fdc31e2497ce5d7ed52512, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit 48df498daf62e1292868005675331929305067f0. For more details please see the references link.
